title.rendered: The Tolerance Conference – Interfaith Testimonies from MJC Alumni

content.rendered:
E-book: “The Tolerance Conference, Interfaith Testimonies from MJC alumni”

This book gives a very personal account of the experience of 5 interfaith alumni who were gathered by Connecting Actions and the Muslim Jewish Conference in April 2021 to share their testimonies on what led them to participate in such an initiative and how it transformed them.

Released in May 2021
